description: Hi! We've waited so long for you，Welcome to PDFME Store. Sincerity, enthusiasm and professional are our service tenet, you can create your own fashion in our store. I believe you can be satisfied with this experience! Gender: Mens / Teen Boys Season: Fall / Winter / Summer Occasion: Daily, Sports, Workout, Holiday Vacation, Beach, Office, Casual, Party, Gym, Street Material: Polyester, Cotton, Spandex Style: Cool, Causal, Fashion, Outdoor LifeStyle, Stylish Features: 【Material】Material: 90% Polyester, 10% Cotton, super comfy, soft and skin friendly. 【Fashion Tops】These trendy shirts hoodies are prefect with sports pants, shorts, jeans, sandals, sneakers for a trendy look; 【Occasions】Fashion Christmas Hooded Sweatshirt Hoodies/Workout Athletic T-Shirt/Slim Fit Sport Zipper Tops, bring you men's athletic performance shirts that deliver more flexibility and a wider range of motions. Suitable for daily wear, Running, cycling,gym,training or yoga, boxing, casual, street. Perfect gifts for your boyfriend, son, husband. 【Size】Size: Asian Size; Before ordering, please carefully check the size chart; Please allow 1-2cm differences due to manual measurement Size Chart: Size: M Top Shoulder: 47cm/18.50'' Top Bust: 112cm/44.09'' Top Length: 73cm/28.74'' Top Sleeve: 64cm/25.20''  Size: L Top Shoulder: 49cm/19.29'' Top Bust: 116cm/45.67'' Top Length: 75cm/29.53'' Top Sleeve: 65cm/25.59''  Size: XL Top Shoulder: 51cm/20.08'' Top Bust: 120cm/47.24'' Top Length: 77cm/30.31'' Top Sleeve: 66cm/25.98''  Size: XXL Top Shoulder: 53cm/20.87'' Top Bust: 124cm/48.82'' Top Length: 79cm/31.10'' Top Sleeve: 67cm/26.38''  Size: 3XL Top Shoulder: 55cm/21.65'' Top Bust: 128cm/50.39'' Top Length: 81cm/31.89'' Top Sleeve: 68cm/26.77''
